data.name: Call of Duty®: Infinite Warfare - Grandma Knows Best VO Pack
data.detailed_description:
Who’s the best at telling you what to do? Grandma! Everyone knows that Grandma Knows Best so listen up while she’s calling out killstreaks or letting you know about enemy activity in multiplayer. Hurry up and win that MP battle because she's got a pie waiting for you in the oven.

This content is only available in English.
